[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@keymanapp/kmc-generate](./kmc-generate.md) &gt; [LdmlKeyboardGenerator](./kmc-generate.ldmlkeyboardgenerator.md) &gt; [run](./kmc-generate.ldmlkeyboardgenerator.run.md)

## LdmlKeyboardGenerator.run() method

Generate a LDML Keyboard project. Returns an object containing binary artifacts on success. The files are passed in by name, and the compiler will use callbacks as passed to the [AbstractGenerator.init()](./kmc-generate.abstractgenerator.init.md) function to read any input files by disk.

**Signature:**

```typescript
run(): Promise<GeneratorResult>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;GeneratorResult&gt;

Binary artifacts on success, null on failure.
